  • Constructor Details

    • Citation

      public Citation(String format, String chapterText, String source, String text, String translation, String book, String chapter, String[] strVerseRange, int[] intVerseRange)
      Citation constructor method sets citation values and initiates formatting methods
      Parameters:
      format - selected format (APA,MLA,Turabian)
      chapterText - selected chapter text
      source - selected source
      text - selected source text
      translation - selected text translation
      book - selected text book
      chapter - chapter number
      strVerseRange - verse start
      intVerseRange - verse end

      strVerseRange - verse number start
      intVerseRange - verse number end
